name: Ungrounded Hog
description:
This game was for GamesFyre first community jam. The theme was worlds of autumn so this game is about Jerry the groundhog who needs to eat before winter begins.

TIPS: enter the ground head first for speed boost.

expect bugs because this game was done very quickly.

Enjoy :)

Game by Michael Probst

Music by Sam Hayden https://soundcloud.com/jelly-sam8
